cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_PORT_FOR_S1U to 0, which is below the valid port range (1-65535), will cause S1-U interface binding failure and prevent user plane connectivity.
cu.explanation_zh: 將 GNB_PORT_FOR_S1U 設定為 0，低於有效端口範圍 (1-65535)，會導致 S1-U 接口綁定失敗，並阻止用戶平面連接。

du.explanation_en: Setting local_n_portd to 0, which is below the valid port range (1-65535), will cause F1 data interface binding failure and prevent DU-CU communication.
du.explanation_zh: 將 local_n_portd 設定為 0，低於有效端口範圍 (1-65535)，會導致 F1 數據接口綁定失敗，並阻止 DU-CU 通信。
